resources.string: Do you want to record the operation?
Do you want to confirm recording, skip this recording but perform the action, modify the recording, or cancel this action?
Can\'t understand your description, please try to describe your action in a different way.

Still can\'t understand your description, please try to describe your intention using contents shown on the screen about the object you have clicked on. You can also refer to properties from its values such as \"cheapest\", \"closest\" or \"earliest\".
Your description doesn\'t match what you clicked on, please try again.

Your description still doesn\'t match what you clicked on, please try to describe your intention using contents shown on the screen about the object you have cliked on. You can also refer to properties in its values such as cheapest, closest or earliest.
Please describe your intention for this action
